citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
**The licensee was unable to locate the required written Program of Veterinary Care during the inspection. As a result the
inspector was unable to review the documents. The licensee is required to maintain a written Program of Veterinary Care
whenever a part time Attending Veterinarian is employed by the facility. Documents that are required to be maintained by
the facility per the AWA regulations should be available for review at the time of inspection in order to determine
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act.
Correct by October 14, 2022
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
**The licensee was unable to locate the required written Program of Veterinary Care during the inspection. As a result the 
inspector was unable to review the documents. The licensee is required to maintain a written Program of Veterinary Care 
whenever a part time Attending Veterinarian is employed by the facility. Documents that are required to be maintained by 
the facility per the AWA regulations should be available for review at the time of inspection in order to determine 
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Correct by October 14, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
